hero.limitedOffer: Limited Time Offer: First Month Free with an Annual Contract!

mainTitle.line1: For those who say, 'I don't have time! I can't do it myself,'

hero.description: As a former global consulting firm employee and full-stack engineer, I will support your company's web marketing efforts.

steps.title: Hearing
steps.description: After contacting us, we will conduct a detailed hearing online or by phone. We will align the current state of your site with your goals and clarify the direction of the project.

steps.title: Quotation & Proposal
steps.description: Based on the hearing, we will present an optimal plan and quotation. If you agree, please inform us via email or chat.

steps.title: Contract & Payment
steps.description: Once you agree to the contract and quotation, the contract will be finalized.

steps.title: Start of Work
steps.description: Once account setup is complete, we will begin specific tasks such as site modification, SEO optimization, and content creation, based on your priorities.

steps.title: Delivery & Feedback
steps.description: We will deliver the completed work and make necessary adjustments. After delivery, we can also conduct regular follow-ups and propose continuous site optimization.

customerPainPoints.title: Are You Facing These Challenges?

points.text: Your existing website doesn’t seem to drive traffic.
You don’t know where to start.
points.altText: Man unsure of where to begin

customerPainPoints.solution: We will solve all your problems!

items.question: Q. Do I need to prepare anything before consulting?
items.answer: No, there’s nothing you need to prepare. If you have rough requests or challenges, please let us know. If you’re still unsure, feel free to reach out.

items.question: Q. Is the quotation free?
items.answer: Yes, the quotation is free. Based on your requirements and budget, we will create a proposal.

items.question: Q. How long does the production period take?
items.answer: It depends on the scale and content, but it usually takes about 1–2 months. The schedule may vary depending on requests and other projects.

items.question: Q. Can you handle advertising operations?
items.answer: Yes, we can manage listing ads and keyword selection alongside SEO. Please inform us during the consultation.

items.question: Q. Is there support after the contract?
items.answer: Depending on the plan or options, we offer follow-up support and periodic reporting to ensure smooth site operation.

items.content: Joined a global consulting firm and supported various companies in DX projects.
Handled service planning at an IT company and contributed to launching new businesses through market research and data analysis.
Worked as a full-stack engineer on web service development and operations, gaining comprehensive technical expertise.
Became an independent consultant and started SEO consulting, providing end-to-end support from web marketing to sales growth.

features.title: Combining Speed and Accuracy
features.description: Achieve flexibility and rapid response unique to freelancers. Leverage analytical skills from a global consulting background to propose effective measures quickly.

features.title: Proven Results Backed by Technology
features.description: With deep technical knowledge as a full-stack engineer, we can handle complex websites. Proven results, such as increasing PV by sixfold, demonstrate effectiveness.

features.title: Support for SMEs
features.description: We cater to small budgets. With a first-month free offer and flexible proposals, we help your business grow.

items.title: Strategy Planning
items.description: We formulate the best strategy to achieve your goals. Based on competitor research and industry-specific approaches, we create actionable plans to ensure SEO success.

items.title: Site Design
items.description: We design your site based on comprehensive factors such as traffic, profitability, and keyword selection.

items.title: Advertising Operations
items.description: We supplement SEO with listing ads. Through precise keyword selection and ad management, we aim for both short-term success and a sustainable growth strategy.

items.title: Content Creation
items.description: We create articles while researching keyword competition. High-quality content is crucial for results, and we emphasize comprehensiveness.

items.title: Data Analysis
items.description: By analyzing access data and user behavior, we propose effective improvements. Our data-driven approach ensures optimized conversion and customer acquisition.

items.title: External Link Strategy
items.description: We help you acquire high-quality external links. Collaborating with trusted sites enhances search engine evaluation.

cards.title: Ranked in the Top 10 After Page Optimization
cards.description: Improved internal links and optimized page structure raised rankings for specific keywords.

cards.title: Weekly PV Increased by Sixfold
cards.description: Within three months, a revamp of design and technical SEO brought remarkable improvements.

price.description: Monthly costs are expected to range from €1,200 to €2,000. The actual amount depends on the scope and volume of work. Please contact us for detailed information.
